document.full_text: italy's defending champion francesca schiavone put in a typically battling display to reach the french open final again with a 6-3 6-3 win over home hope marion bartoli thursday.
document.title: schiavone downs bartoli to fly into final at french open
lines_and_colors: italy's defending champion francesca schiavone put in a typically battling display to reach the french open final again with a 6-3 6-3 win over home hope marion bartoli thursday.
